Product.name: WinForms
Product.Blurb: 65+ Smart and powerful WinForms controls for rapid UI development. Supports .NET 2.0 and higher.

Product.name: MVC
Product.Blurb: Modern controls for today's web. A set of fast and lightweight data management and visualization MVC controls built on latest web standards.

Product.name: ASPNETWijmo
Product.Blurb: 40+ ASP.NET controls built on Web standards (AJAX, CSS, HTML5, and jQuery). Also available as Extenders and MVC tools. Supports .NET 3.5 and higher.

Product.name: WPF
Product.Blurb: 50+ WPF controls for line of business apps and data visualization. Supports .NET 4.0 and higher. Download includes OLAP for WPF.

Product.name: SLV
Product.Blurb: 60+ Silverlight controls for line of business apps and data visualization. Supports Silverlight 5. Download includes OLAP for Silverlight.

Product.name: RTPhone
Product.Blurb: 40+ UI controls for building Windows Store and Universal Windows Phone 8.1 apps.

Product.name: LightSwitch

ShortCut.LongName: LightSwitch Cloud Business Apps Online Help
LightSwitch Cloud Business Apps Release Notes

Product.Blurb: Extensions for the LightSwitch HTML Client (powered by Wijmo) and the Desktop Client (powered by Studio for Silverlight). Includes grids, charts, calendars, OLAP, and more.

Product.name: XapOptimizer
Product.Blurb: In one click, reduce the size of your Silverlight apps up to 70% and secure your code with obfuscation.

Product.name: IntelliSpell
Product.Blurb: Spell-check code, comments, strings, HTML, XML, resources, and general text without ever leaving the Microsoft Visual Studio environment.

Product.name: ActiveX
Product.Blurb: Full suite of the most popular ActiveX components including controls like True DBGrid and VSFlexGrid.

Product.name: WebApi
Product.Blurb: Import spreadsheets and export any data management or visualization control to the format of your choice. Create a pie chart and export it to an image, export your grid to Excel, or import a Excel sheet into a FlexGrid.

Product.name: UWP
Product.Blurb: Over 40 UI controls for Universal Windows Platform

Fails.ErrorMsg: Installation requires Visual Studio 2010 or above
